amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide an exemption for communications pertaining to civil rights and issues affecting minorities.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 31 printed in the Congressional Record February 12, 2002 exempting from the bill any communications/advertisement that consists of information or commentary about a person holding or seeking federal office on any matter pertaining to civil rights.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Watts (OK) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 237 (Roll no. 25).
